name: Vinca
description: Vinca, also known as Periwinkle, is a genus of six species of herbaceous perennials or evergreen shrubs in the family Apocynaceae, native to Europe, northwest Africa and Middle East.These easy-to-care plants are grown for their glossy, dark green foliage and eye-catching, pinwheel-shaped flowers. They are great for beds, borders and as ground covers. Their unique flowers are perfect for bouquets and special occasions, or simply for bringing color and joy to your home.
meaning: The genus name comes from the Latin word “vincire”, which means “to bind, fetter”, based on the plant’s trailing habit.
color_description: Vinca comes in shades of pink, purple, red and white.
